GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v4.14.258
GSD.description:
iio: accel: kxcjk-1013: Fix possible memory leak in probe and remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.258 by commit 3899700ddacbf7aaafadf44464fff3ff0d4e3307, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit a25691c1f9674090fb66586cf4c5d60d3efdf339. For more details please see the references link.
